mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(s.deal_amount, s.deposit) AS deal_amount, e.build_year FROM all_real_estate e JOIN all_real_estate_sales s ON e.id = s.estate_id WHERE e.latitude BETWEEN #{lat} - 0.01 AND #{lat} + 0.01 AND e.longitude BETWEEN #{lng} - 0.01 AND #{lng} + 0.01 ORDER BY s.deal_year DESC, s.deal_month DESC, s.deal_day DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT A.res_violation_status AS violationStatus, B.res_use_type AS buildingPurpose FROM api_building_register A LEFT JOIN api_building_register_building_status B ON A.id = B.register_id WHERE A.latitude BETWEEN #{lat} - 0.01 AND #{lat} + 0.01 AND A.longitude BETWEEN #{lng} - 0.01 AND #{lng} + 0.01 LIMIT 1;
